ygData.subject: Furfil Curtailing Chant question
ygData.msgSnippet: I keep forgetting to test this for myself whenever I log on.  I always start talking with my guild and friends every time I log on and then kick myself when I
ygData.messageBody:
I keep forgetting to test this for myself whenever I log on. I always start
talking with my guild and friends every time I log on and then kick myself
when I log off for forgetting. Anyway..

Has anyone tested the level 30 song (FCC) since the recent patch to see if
equipping a drum now increases the effect of the song (more DOT damage and
more MR debuff)? If it has been fixed, does a MM battle drum increase the
effect even more?

Also, does the MR debuff from FCC stack with the MR debuff from Pixie
Strike?

Thanks
Galtin of E'ci
